title: Trump, Weighing Third Bid for President, Sets ‘Big Announcement’ for Next Week
description: The former president, after days of promotional teases, talks up “a very big announcement on Nov. 15 at Mar-a-Lago” during a rally for J.D. Vance in Ohio.
dc:creator: Michael C. Bender
media:credit: Maddie McGarvey for The New York Times
media:description: Waiting for former President Donald J. Trump to speak on Monday in Ohio.
